BookingState is a concrete implementation of IBookingState.
BookingState() - Constructor for class state.BookingState
Create a new BookingState that keeps track of the next booking number it will generate (starting from 1 and incrementing by 1 each time a new booking number is needed), and an empty list of bookings

command - package command
The command package contains all the commands that implement the ICommand interface.
Consumer - Class in model
Consumer represents a user of the application, who can browse Events and book TicketedEvents.
Consumer(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Consumer
Create a new Consumer with an empty list of bookings and default Covid-19 preferences
ConsumerPreferences - Class in model
A set of Covid-19 preferences that Consumers can save in their profile and filter Events based on them.
ConsumerPreferences() - Constructor for class model.ConsumerPreferences
Default values are: preferSocialDistancing = false preferAirFiltration = false preferOutdoorsOnly = false preferredMaxCapacity = Integer.MAX_VALUE preferredMaxVenueSize = Integer.MAX_VALUE
Context - Class in controller
Context is a wrapper around the entire app state.
Context() - Constructor for class controller.Context
Initialises all the state members with default constructors of the concrete implementations: MockPaymentSystem, UserState, EventState, BookingState, and SponsorshipState.
Context(Context) - Constructor for class controller.Context
Copy constructor, makes a deep copy of another Context, except for the Context.paymentSystem, for which a shallow reference copy is made.
controller - package controller
The controller package contains the Context and Controller classes.
Controller - Class in controller
Controller is the main external interface of this application.
Controller() - Constructor for class controller.Controller
The Controller constructor creates and keeps a reference to a new Context.
createBooking(Consumer, EventPerformance, int, double) - Method in class state.BookingState
 
createBooking(Consumer, EventPerformance, int, double) - Method in interface state.IBookingState
Create a new Booking (includes generating a new unique booking number) and add it to the booking state

D

Dance - model.EventType
 

E

EntertainmentProvider - Class in model
EntertainmentProvider is a user of the application, who represents an organisation that hosts Events.
EntertainmentProvider(String, String, String, String, String, String, List<String>, List<String>) - Constructor for class model.EntertainmentProvider
Create a new EntertainmentProvider with an empty list of own events and a MockEntertainmentProviderSystem for their organisation.
EntertainmentProviderSystem - Interface in external
Interface for the external EntertainmentProviderSystem, it allows informing about changes made to events and bookings on our system, and querying for up-to-date number of available tickets for a given EventPerformance (in case ticket sales are made outside this system).
Event - Class in model
Event is an abstraction, containing common state and behaviour that NonTicketedEvents and TicketedEvents share.
Event(long, EntertainmentProvider, String, EventType) - Constructor for class model.Event
Create a new Event with status = EventStatus.ACTIVE and an empty collection of performances
eventNumberResult - Variable in class command.CreateEventCommand
 
EventPerformance - Class in model
EventPerformance represents an event taking place at a concrete place, date, and time.
EventPerformance(long, Event, String, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, List<String>, boolean, boolean, boolean, int, int) - Constructor for class model.EventPerformance
 
EventState - Class in state
EventState is a concrete implementation of IEventState.
EventState() - Constructor for class state.EventState
Create a new EventState with an empty list of events, which keeps track of the next event and performance numbers it will generate, starting from 1 and incrementing by 1 each time when requested
EventState(IEventState) - Constructor for class state.EventState
Copy constructor to make a deep copy of another EventState instance
EventStatus - Enum in model

LogEntry - Class in logging
LogEntry is a single entry in the log kept by the singleton Logger.

Logger - Class in logging
Logger is a singleton that can be retrieved from anywhere to add log entries.
logging - package logging
The logging package contains the singleton Logger that logs events from anywhere in the application

User - Class in model
User is an abstraction, containing common state and behaviours shared by different kinds of users: Consumers, EntertainmentProviders, and GovernmentRepresentatives.
User(String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.User
Create a new User and save the user email and payment account email, but do not save the password in plaintext! This would be a security disaster, because a hacker could easily get it out of the application.
UserState - Class in state
UserState is a concrete implementation of IUserState.

Create a new UserState with an empty collection of users and the currently logged-in user set to null.
UserState(IUserState) - Constructor for class state.UserState
Copy constructor to create a deep copy of another UserState instance
